text: Kjersti Døvigen (27 June 1943 - 1 February 2021) was a Norwegian actress. She was born in Oslo, Norway. She acted in Elskere (1963), Douglas (1970), The Last Fleksnes (1974), Lasse & Geir (1976), Bør Børson II (1976) and Life and Death (1980). Døvigen died on 1 February 2021 in Oslo, aged 77. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1943 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Norwegian movie actors Category:Norwegian television actors Category:Norwegian stage actors Category:Actors from Oslo
title: Kjersti Døvigen
